channel.title: Need Java Heap Help

item.title: Need Java Heap Help
item.dc:creator: @mvp566 mvp566
item.description:
@mvp566 wrote:

ok every once in a while i get a java heap and i heard that under server.java you can change ur max connections well i found out where i just dont understand what number to put here what mine looks like

}*/else { int Found = -1; for (int i = 0; i < MaxConnections; i++) { if (Connections[i] == connectingHost) { Found = ConnectionCount[i]; break; } }

so then i tried changing the i++ to 30 and when i compiled i got this

[code]server.java:135: not a statement
for (int i = 0; i < MaxConnectio
ns; 50) {

^

1 error
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
